items.sentence: Why did you think that it was a bad idea to do that?
Tom sold his house and moved into a small apartment.
Tom shouldn't be allowed to go to Boston by himself.
Tom should've gone to Mary's concert, but he didn't.
Tom seems a lot more relaxed when Mary isn't around.
Tom says he expects Mary to do that on October 20th.
Tom said he didn't remember how to use the shredder.
Tom obviously didn't know what he was talking about.
Tom lives in a small house on the outskirts of town.
Tom is the only one who doesn't know how to do that.
